text: With uncanning might, Surtha Lenks hewes the infamous spear of the Tokmars tribe.
Marauder mobs are awarded even greater mobility when riding their crude chariots of bone and wood, lashed together with the guts and sinew of the vanquished.
Tainted and savage they may be, but these behemoths remain willing to bear high-status Marauders into battle, trampling flat everything foolish enough to get in their way.

His piercing gaze is said to be able to see the sins of the deceased.
Phakth the God of the Sky and Justice
